st: Aaj Kuchh Sharmaye Se Lagte Ho,
s:

st: Kya Mausam Aaya Hai,
s:
Kya Mausam Aaya Hai,
Har Taraf Pani Hi Pani Laya Hai,
Ek Jadu Sa Chhaya Hai,
Tum Ghar Se Bahar Mat Niklna,
Warna Log Kahenge Barsat Hui Nahi,
Aur Mendhak Nikal Aaya Hai…

st: Hum Aaj Bhi Dil Ka Aashiyana Sajane Se Darte Hai,

Hum Aaj Bhi Dil Ka Aashiyana Sajane Se Darte Hai,

Aapki Chaal Mor Jaise,

st: Main Tere Aane Ka Intejar Karunga
s:
Main Tere Aane Ka Intejar Karunga
Tu Jaha Jaigi Main Tere Sath Rahunga
Tu Jab Mujhe Yad Karegi Mai Tere Paas Aaunga
Ye Dosti Mai Marte Dum Tak Nibhata Rahunga
Aur Na Nibha Saka To Main
Tere Hath Kisi Aur Ke Hath Me Dekar Jaunga…

st: Girl Ki Hostal Me Ek Boy Ko Khuli Permission Hai
s:
Girl Ki Hostal Me Ek Boy Ko Khuli Permission Hai
Ki  Jab Chahe Girl Ke Bathroom Me Ja Sakta Hai
Or Jaha Chahe Chhu Sakta Hai

Lifebuoy Ko…

st: Kaun Sa Gham Hai Jo Yeh Haal Bana Rakha Hai,
s:
Kaun Sa Gham Hai Jo Yeh Haal Bana Rakha Hai,

st: Sms Bhejne Ka Nahi Tha Shok Hamein,
s:
Sms Bhejne Ka Nahi Tha Shok Hamein,

Zindagi Be-Haal Hai,

st: Jise Dil Diya Woh Delhi Chali Gayi,
s:

.

st: Ice Cream :-
s:
Ice Cream :-

Isi Tarah Se Humne,

Kar Gyi Ghar Mera Khali

st: Isq Ne Gaalib,
s:
Isq Ne Gaalib,

s:
Aam Meethe, Angur Khatte
Aam Meethe, Angur Khatte
Mere Shair Padhne Wale Ullu Ke Patthe.

st: Usne Jis Jis Jagah Rakkhe Kadam
s:
Usne Jis Jis Jagah Rakkhe Kadam
Humne Woh Har Jameen Choom Li
Aur Vo Bewafa Ghar Aa Kr Kahti Hai,
“Aap Ka Ladka Mitti Khata Hai”

st: Ek Boond Se Sagar Nahi Banta
s:
Ek Boond Se Sagar Nahi Banta
Rone Se Mukaddar Nahin Banta
Patana Hai To Pura Girls Hostel Patao
Ek Ladki Patake Koi Sikandar Nahin Banta.

st: Ek Truck Ke Peechhe Likha Tha, “Saavan Ko Aane Do”
s:
Ek Truck Ke Peechhe Likha Tha, “Saavan Ko Aane Do”
Ek Doosra Truck Usmein Peechhe Se Ghus Gaya,
Pata Hai, Uske Pechhe Kya Likha Tha?
“Aaya Saavan Jhoom Ke”

st: Dhoka Mila Jab Pyar Mein
s:
Dhoka Mila Jab Pyar Mein
Zindagi Mein Udaasi Chhaa Gayi
Socha Tha Chhod Denge In Raaho Ko
Per Aaj Mohalle Mein Dusri Aa Gayi.

st: Tum Sa Koi Dusra Jamin Par Hua,
s:
Tum Sa Koi Dusra Jamin Par Hua,
Toh Rab Se Shikayat Hogi,
Ki, Ek Toh Jhela Nahi Jata,
Doosra Kahi Mil Gaya To Kaya Halat Hogi.

st: Kaya Aankhen Hai,
s:
Kaya Aankhen Hai,
Kaya Baaten Hain,
Kaya Chehra Tumne Paya Hai,
Aisa Lagta Hai Jaise,
Jaise, Peepal Ke Ped Se Bhoot Utarkar Aaya Hai.

st: Jisey Dil Diyaa Voh Delhi Chali Gayee,
s:
Jisey Dil Diyaa Voh Delhi Chali Gayee,
Jisey Pyaar Kiyaa Voh Italy Chali Gayee,
Dil Ne Kaha Khud Khusi Ker Le Zalim,
Bijli (electricity) Ko Haath Lagaaya To Bijli Chali Gayee.

st: Hume Tumse Love Hai,
s:
Hume Tumse Love Hai,
Please Refuse Na Karna,
Yeh Zero Watt Ka “Hope” Bulb Hai,
Please Ise Fuse Mat Karna.

st: Rok Deyo Mere Janaaze Nu,
s:
Rok Deyo Mere Janaaze Nu,
Mere Vich Jaan Aa Gayi Hai,
Saaleyo, Peeche Mudh Ke Dekho,
Sharab Di Dukan Aa Gayi Hai… Cheers!

st: Message Pe Message Bhejte Ho,
s:
Message Pe Message Bhejte Ho,
Bhej Bhej Ke Bheja Kharab Karte Ho,
Bhejte Ho To Bhi Kaya Bhejte Ho,
Khud Ka Bheja To Chalta Nahi,
Doosron Ka Bheja Hua Bhejte Ho.

st: Ramchandra Keh Gaye Siya Se,
s:
Ramchandra Keh Gaye Siya Se,
Aisa Kalyug Ayega,
Ek Dost Ek Taraf Se SMS Karega,
Doosra Apna Paisa Bachayega

st: Bazuon Me Dum Rakhta Hu,
s:
Bazuon Me Dum Rakhta Hu,
Dil Me Gham Rakhta Hu,
Pata Tha SMS Ayega Tera,
Isliye Painkiller Sang Rakhta Hu.

st: Aaj Deedar, Kal Yaar,
s:
Aaj Deedar, Kal Yaar,
Parson Pyaar,
Phir Ekraar, Phir Intzaar,
Phir Takraar, Phir Draar,
Saari Mehnat Bekar,
Aur Aakhir Me Ek Aur Devdas,
at Beer Bar.

st: Jab Jab Ghire Badal Teri Yaad Aayi,
s:
Jab Jab Ghire Badal Teri Yaad Aayi,
Jab Jhoom Ke Barsa Sawan Teri Yaad Aayi,
Jab-Jab Main Bhiga Teri Yaad Aayi,
Ab Raha Nahi Jata, Chattri Lauta De Bhai

st: Safar Lamba Hai Dost Banaate Rahiye,
s:
Safar Lamba Hai Dost Banaate Rahiye,
Dil Mile Na Mile, Haath Badalate Rahiye,
Taj Mahal Na Banaiye Mehnga Padega,
Magar Har Taraf Mumtaj Banate Rahiye
